en.title: What?
en.intro: Our actions are oriented to support People on the Move who are facing violent push-backs, fatigue and sickness at the stepdoor of the EU. NNK runs a threefold intervention to ensure that equal treatment is a resource available to everyone and that no injustice is hidden.
en.programsTitle: Our Programs to support people´s rights

programs.title: HEALTH ON THE MOVE
programs.description: NNK provides First Aid on the spot to PoM who cannot access public healthcare systems. In addition, NNK distribute hygiene kits to promote healthy practices and covers cases in need of specialized treatments (dentist, ophthalmologist…).

programs.title: FOOD & MORE
programs.description: NNK teams on the field distribute food, clothes, blankets and sleeping bags to provide the people with means to their protection. Also, in Bosnia NNK has a food vouchers empowering people in need to buy what they need in local supermarkets.

programs.title: ADVOCACY TO STOP BORDER VIOLENCE
programs.description: NNK reports the testimonies of people who suffer violent pushbacks and as founders of the Border Violence Monitoring Network we work to raise awareness and to advocate for a change in policymaking.
